
### floating point calling convention 


* use <code>%xmm</code> registers in order


### note: variadic functions  {.smaller}


* variable number of arguments 

   * <code>printf</code>, <code>scanf</code>, …
   * see <code>man stdarg</code>
 
<hr class="vspace" />
* same as usual
* … but `%rax` contains number of <code>%xmm</code> used
